Invitation to Join the community
Dear Dr.{{name}}
We are pleased to announce that you joined the DentalLive community .
Dental live Planner is a robust dentalcommunication-multidisciplinary case management HIPPA compliant tool with multiple featuressuch as:
A) Referring patients
B) Collaboration between dental team members (General dentists, specialists, office staff,dental labs and digital specialists.
C) Cloud base data sharing.
D) One centralized location of data.
E) All file formats can be uploaded/downloaded and can be selectively viewed.
F) Add and remove team members based on the complexity of the case.
G) Collaborate with your dental students on case planning and patient treatment managementstrategies.
H) Secure dental live mail/dental live talk.
I) Adding milestones for upcoming treatments for enhanced team communication.
J) And many more features......
Thank you
Team Dental Live
Connect, Communicate, Collaborate!
Welcome to the Dental Live community!!!!
